title: Chung Kuo - Cina(1972)
description:
Year of release: 1972 
Country: Italy 
Genre: Documentary 
Duration: 03.28.00 
: Subtitles 
Russian subtitles: yes 

Director: Michelangelo Antonioni (Michelangelo Antonioni) 

Description: In 1972, at the height of the Cultural Revolution, the Chinese government has invited Antonioni and his team spend eight weeks surveying Beijing, Nanjing, Suzhou, Shanghai and the province of Henan. Disappointed in America after "" Zabriskie Point, "directed by willingly accepts the invitation, intrigued by the opportunity to see the closed country. 

The result was a nearly four-hour documentary in three parts entitled "China - the Middle Empire." The film, imbued with the deepest respect for the people, its culture, history and truly reflects the new life. Remembering what he saw and felt and the emotions awakened in him, Antonioni creates a movie, exciting and tender, the film on behalf of the director, looking at the country rather than a sterile paper entitled "achievements of New China." 

Surprisingly, this picture angered Chinese authorities. The fact is that in the beginning of the film by Antonioni warned that shows only that he be allowed to withdraw the authorities. It was then that Michelangelo had his first stroke. 

Extras. Information: Translation - a group of Animi, sharky rip done with the film club "Phoenix"
